attributes.action: Give everyone with a car driving licence entitlements to drive C1
attributes.additional_details: This would mobilise a larger potential workforce, which should enable a more effective restart of the economy. These steps should enable immediate help towards food deliveries and allow more resilience across the nation
attributes.background: Currently there is an international shortage of commercial drivers. Given the pandemic there is a major backlog of tests. The Government are allowing car drivers to tow trailers up to 3,500kg - why not allow. C1 without a trailer also?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same/a similar action: 

Give everyone with a car driving licence entitlements to drive C1 and D1 vehicle:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596949
